comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content:
Is this where the ice-skating rink ended up?

I think Prince Albert Victor would have seen this in his 1881 visit.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Wonderful picture of a wonderful building from a wonderful album. I (again) spent several hours going through the album this came from. I can recommend to anyone who wants to time travel via an 1881 'slide night'. Great sport trying to guess what the view is before each page and title loads. Surprises and treasures await! acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=836375 .
